title: MRI Scan
discription: Today’s healthcare challenges are growing and becoming more specific to individual patient needs.

title: CT Scan
discription: It’s about understanding how one CT exam can improve patient outcomes while lowering the cost of providing care.

title: ICU & CCU
discription: Intensive care unit is special department of our hospital that provides intensive care medicine, and treatment to critically ill patients.

title: Cath Lab
discription: JEWMCH Cath lab department was inaugurated recently to cater the increasing number of patients with heart-related issues in the city.

title: OT Complex
discription: A coronary care unit (CCU) or cardiac intensive care unit (CICU) is a hospital ward specialized in the care of patients with heart attacks.

title: Endoscopy & Colonoscopy
discription: Most endoscopy procedures use an instrument called an endoscope.  An endoscope is a long, thin, flexible tube with a camera on the end.

title: Asthma
discription: Asthma is a common long-term inflammatory disease of the airways of the lungs. It is characterized by variable and recurring symptoms, reversible airflow obstruction, and bronchospasm.

title: Cancer Treatment
discription: Cancer is a group of diseases involving abnormal cell growth with the potential to invade or spread to other parts of the body.

title: Chest Medicine
discription: Chest Medicine Associates is a group of physicians who are fellowship-trained and board-certified in the specialties of pulmonary.
